propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.defaultValue: The default value. Use when the component is not controlled.
propDescriptions.emptyIcon: The icon to display when empty.
propDescriptions.emptyLabelText: The label read when the rating input is empty.
propDescriptions.getLabelText:
Accepts a function which returns a string value that provides a user-friendly name for the current value of the rating.
For localization purposes, you can use the provided translations.

Signature:
function(value: number) => string
value: The rating label's value to format.
propDescriptions.name: The name attribute of the radio input elements. This input name should be unique within the page. Being unique within a form is insufficient since the name is used to generated IDs.
propDescriptions.onChange:
Callback fired when the value changes.

Signature:
function(event: object, value: number) => void
event: The event source of the callback.
value: The new value.
propDescriptions.onChangeActive:
Callback function that is fired when the hover state changes.

Signature:
function(event: object, value: number) => void
event: The event source of the callback.
value: The new value.
propDescriptions.precision: The minimum increment value change allowed.
propDescriptions.readOnly: Removes all hover effects and pointer events.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

sizeSmall.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

sizeLarge.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

readOnly.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

disabled.description: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

focusVisible.description: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if keyboard focused.

label.description: Styles applied to the label elements.

labelEmptyValueActive.description: Styles applied to the label of the "no value" input when it is active.

icon.description: Styles applied to the icon wrapping elements.

iconEmpty.description: Styles applied to the icon wrapping elements when empty.

iconFilled.description: Styles applied to the icon wrapping elements when filled.

iconHover.description: Styles applied to the icon wrapping elements when hover.

iconFocus.description: Styles applied to the icon wrapping elements when focus.

iconActive.description: Styles applied to the icon wrapping elements when active.

decimal.description: Styles applied to the icon wrapping elements when decimals are necessary.
